title: The Wholistic Pet<>Hiver | Renewal + AI Review

signals.problem_statement: The customer finds the AI features to be hidden and not readily available, leading to underutilization.
signals.customer_ask: The customer would like more visible suggestions or prompts for using AI features.

signals.problem_statement: The customer experiences a workflow breakdown when responding to repetitive customer inquiries due to the lack of efficient template suggestions.
signals.customer_ask: The customer wants a system that suggests previously used responses for similar inquiries.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is confused about the AI capabilities and how to effectively use them, leading to frustration.
signals.customer_ask: The customer seeks clearer guidance on how to utilize AI features effectively.

signals.problem_statement: The customer does not see value in sentiment analysis, indicating it may not be useful for their current email management needs.
